issue.title: Indication when all ignition processes are launched

content.raw: What is the expected behavior wrt `/clock` topic? Are you saying that when the clock starts ticking, everything is ready on the simulation side and we are free to start controlling the robots? If that is the case we will try to verify. If not, please elaborate.
content.html: What is the expected behavior wrt /clock topic? Are you saying that when the clock starts ticking, everything is ready on the simulation side and we are free to start controlling the robots? If that is the case we will try to verify. If not, please elaborate.
